text:
The Controller shall audit the accounts of all boards, offices, and employees of the City and County, charged in any manner with the custody, collection or disbursement of funds, as provided by Section 3.303 of the Charter. He or she shall investigate the unit cost of all work done by the City and County as provided in Section 3.301 of the Charter and shall also make all investigations and reports provided for in 
Chapter 6 of this Code. 
(Bill No. 424, Ord. No. 9.0621(C.S) Sec. 1) 
SEC. 10.6-1.
(Added by Ord. 175-71, App. 7/8/71; repealed by Ord. 313-00, File No. 001908, App. 12/28/2000)

heading.catch_text: AUDITS AND INVESTIGATIONS BY CONTROLLER – TO BE PERFORMED AS REQUIRED BY CHARTER.
